author: ryanleeschneider
content: RE: https://blog.ethereum.org/2021/11/29/how-the-merge-impacts-app-layer/ (Safe Head section): Will `eth_subscribe(newHeads)` track `latest` or `unsafe` after the Merge?  What about the behavior of `eth_getByNumber(finalized)` _before_ the Merge?

author: parithosh
content: The earlier used github testnet `eth2-clients` organization has been renamed to `eth-clients` since we'd be using it for merged testnets and potentially all the future testnets. Github redirects should mean links still work, but please update your CI's if any.
